lines: 1. Pinyni ok thurwa mwageno;Waonge dala mosiko;To wachni ohoyo chunywa,Wakiyo dala mabiro,Wakiyo dala mabiro.
2. Pinyni ok thurwa mwageno;Wakiyo dala ma ok nen;Zayun e nyinge dala Ruoth;Orieny gi ler ma nyaka chieng`,Orieny gi ler ma nyaka chieng`.
3. Dala maber mar mor gi kuwe;Kar hawi chandruok onge chuth;Da an gi buomb winyo koro,Daringi mond` ayue kanyo,Daringi mond` ayue kanyo.
4. Chunya, kuwe mos! Ruoth ong`eyo,Ndalo ma iniyud yueyo;E piny ka mond` atim chikne,Ka pod arito ndalono,Ka pod arito ndalono.
